Number of likes increments in case the article wasn't liked before
Check if the number of likes decrements in case the article was liked before
Logged in user can go to New Post screen by clicking the "New Post" link
Users that is not logged in can't reach New Post screen by the link
Link "New Post" is between "Home" and "Settings" links in the header navigation
Publication of the article is possible if the user fills in all the fields (the tag field may be empty)
Error message “Title of article can’t be empty (minimum 5 symbols)” appears if user tries to leave Article title field blank
User can create two or more articles with the same title
Error message appears if user tries to input less than 5 characters in the Article title field
Error message appears if user tries to input more than 240 characters in the Article title field
Article publishing is possible with Article title field length = 5
Article publishing is possible with Article title field length = 6
Article publishing is possible with Article title field length = 239
Article publishing is possible with Article title field length = 240
Error message appears if user tries to input space as the first character in the Article title field
Error message appears if user tries to input space as the last character in the Article title field
Error message appears if user tries to input few spaces in a row in the Article title field
Article publishing is possible if user input letters, numbers, special characters and spaces in the Article title field
Error message appears if user tries to leave What’s this article about? field blank
Error message appears if user tries to input less than 10 characters in the What’s this article about? field
Error message appears if user tries to input more than 240 characters in the What’s this article about? field
Article publishing is possible with What’s this article about? field length = 10
Article publishing is possible with What’s this article about? field length = 11
Article publishing is possible with What’s this article about? field length = 239
Article publishing is possible with What’s this article about? field length = 240
Error message appears if user tries to input space as the first character in the What’s this article about? field
Error message appears if user tries to input space as the last character in the What’s this article about? field
Error message appears if user tries to input few spaces in a row in the What’s this article about? field
Article publishing is possible if user input letters, numbers, special characters and spaces in the What’s this article about? field
Error message "Body of article can't be blank" appears if user tries to leave Write your article field blank
Error message appears if user tries to input less than 20 characters in the Write your article field
Error message appears if user tries to input more than 9000 characters in the Write your article field
Article publishing is possible with Write your article field length = 20
Article publishing is possible with Write your article field length = 21
Article publishing is possible with Write your article field length = 8999
Article publishing is possible with Write your article field length = 9000
No attachments field on the page
User can slide-down right corner of text box of the Write your article field to change its size
Error message appears if user tries to input space as the first character in the Write your article field
Error message appears if user tries to input space as the last character in the Write your article field
Error message appears if user tries to input few spaces in a row in the Write your article field
Article publishing is possible if user input letters, numbers, special characters and spaces in the Write your article field
Article publishing is possible if user decides to leave this field blank
User can add a tag if it consists only letters and numbers
User can't add a tag if it consists special characters and spaces
Tag can't be added if it's length more than 30 characters
Tag can't be added if it's length = 1
Tag can be added if it's length = 2
Tag can be added if it's length = 3
Tag can be added if it's length = 29
Tag can be added if it's length = 30
User can't add more than 10 tags
Tag can be added only if it's begin from # (hashtag) symbol
Enter tags field is not key sensitive
Check if can add own article to Favourited Articles after clicking this button
Check if article is dissapearing from Favourited Articles list after clicking this button
Check if can post an empty comment
Check if comment is adding by clicking this button
User can get on User's Article page after publishing it (redirection)
User can get on User's Article page from My Articles tab on User page
User can get on User's Article page from Global Feed tab (when is logged in as author)
The functionality of User's Article page is available only for logged in author of the article
Title of the article is in the navigation block on the User's Article page
User's avatar and username is in the navigation block on the User's Article page
User's avatar and username is a link to the User's page
Article publish date is in the navigation block on the User's Article page
[Edit Article] button is in the navigation block on the User's Article page
[Delete Article] button is in the navigation block on the User's Article page
[Edit Article] button opens an Edit Article screen
[Delete Article] button deletes the article (no warning messages, can't be undone)
Full text of article is in the Main body of the article block under the Navigation block
"Sign in or sign up to add comments on this article" message for users that are not logged in
Error message appears if user tries to leave Write a comment field blank
Error message appears if user tries to input more than 240 characters to the Write a comment field
Comment publishing is possible if Write a comment field length = 1
Comment publishing is possible if Write a comment field length = 2
Comment publishing is possible if Write a comment field length = 239
Comment publishing is possible if Write a comment field length = 240
Comment publishing is possible if user input letters, numbers, special characters and spaces in Write a comment field
Comment is publishing after user push [Post Comment] button at the lower right corner
User's avatar is at the lower left corner of Comment form
User can slide-down right corner of text box of the Write a comment field to change its size
Text of published comment is in the block under the Comment form
Name and avatar of the comment's author is in lower left corner under the Text of comment
[Delete comment] button (trash icon) is in lower right corner under the Text of comment (seen only for comment's author)
Name and avatar of the comment's author links to User page
[Delete comment] button deletes the comment that is chosen
After user clicks [Edit Article] button article has all the data that it had
Edit Article screen can be reached only by logged in authors with published articles
Redirecting to the Article page if logged in but not the author or logged out user tries to open Edit Article screen link
Error message appears if user during editing tries to leave any required field blank (any field except Enter tags field)
[Publish Article] button renamed to [Edit Article] button on Edit Article screen
[Edit Article] button validates all the fields and save changes
User can click [Edit Article] button without making any changes
[Cancel] button added
[Cancel] button returns the user to the User's Article page without saving the changes that user made
